question_text: In a mixed SAS/SATA environment, what limitation applies to SATA drives when connected to a SAS controller?
answer_options: SATA drives cannot use full-duplex connections
SATA drives must be formatted in RAID 0
SATA drives are not visible to the operating system
correct_answer: SATA drives cannot use full-duplex connections
